 2021-10052021-12-09,  ,  NRCAN,  LAB,  TC,  ,  , 
ActCanada-Newfoundland and Labrador Atlantic Accord Implementation Act
SubjectCanada–Newfoundland and Labrador Offshore Area Occupational Health and Safety Regulations
PrecisCANADA-NEWFOUNDLAND AND LABRADOR OFFSHORE OCCUPATIONAL HEALTH AND SAFETY REGULATIONS in order to (1) establish permanent occupational health and safety regulations in each of the Canada-Newfoundland and Labrador offshore areas that are appropriate for the unique hazards that exist in remote, offshore petroleum workplaces, and therefore ensure the health and safety of offshore employees and other personnel in the workplace; and (2) provide flexibility to internationally flagged Mobile Offshore Drilling Units and ships to comply with the established health and safety requirements while working in Canada’s offshore Accord areas.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0247 Publication Date: 2021-12-22
